title: Geobreeders: File-X Chibi Neko Dakkan
alternative_title: Geobreeders: (File-X) Get Back The Kitty, ジオブリーダーズ　File-X　ちびねこ奪還
description: Taba and the Girls of Kagura Total Security Inc. specialize in jobs where their enemy are "Phantom Cats". They have a few run ins with the various Government agencies, as well as a gang of Phantom Cats; blowing up a lot of stuff along the way. When one of their own is kidnapped, they have to get her back.
